<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->

          <div class="col-lg-8 col-sm-8 col-10 team">

            <span class="pct">

              <span class="name"><a sib-team-urls team="team.profile" data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}" class="anchor-unstyled"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></span>
              <span class="team-name"><a data-ng-href="/teamindex/#!/#{{ team.profile.conference.toLowerCase() }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.displayConference"></span> <span data-ng-i18next="leagueLeadingTeams.conference"></span></a></span>
            </div>

</div>

<div class="row">

            <div class="LIASOLR gd6 fl gd12" id="2662D3F0-E8F2-4861-A231-BBFA9EC3D850">              <div class="theId" id="empminas">                <a class="anchor" name="solrator_empminas"></a>

                <textarea name="afterRender" style="display: none;"></textarea>

                <h3>Últimas Notícias</h3>
                <ul class="container"></ul>
                <div class="clear"></div>

                <div class="clear"></div>
                <a class="linkGeral " style="display: none;"></a>

              <script type="text/javascript">

function tiraAcento(text) {

var acentos =[
	/[\300-\306]/g, /[\340-\346]/g, // A, a
	/[\310-\313]/g, /[\350-\353]/g, // E, e
	/[\314-\317]/g, /[\354-\357]/g, // I, i
	/[\322-\330]/g, /[\362-\370]/g, // O, o
	/[\331-\334]/g, /[\371-\374]/g, // U, u
	/[\321]/g, /[\361]/g, // N, n
	/[\307]/g, /[\347]/g, // C, c
	];

var chars = ['A','a','E','e','I','i','O','o','U','u','N','n','C','c'];

for (var i = 0; i < acentos.length; i++) {
    text = text.replace(acentos[i],chars[i]);
}

return text;
}

if(typeof Solrator != 'undefined'){

	/*todos os empilhamentos solr*/
	var els = $(".LIASOLR");
		
	for(x=0;x<els.length;x++){
		
		/*el*/
		e = els[x];
		
		if(!$(e).hasClass("alreadyLoaded")){
			
			/*para evitar duplo carregamento para multiplos componentes solr na pagina
			* add class alreadyLoaded
			*/
			$(e).addClass("alreadyLoaded");
			
			/*id da instancia global na pagina*/
			var id = $(e).find("input[name='id']").val();
						
			
			/*params*/			
			window['tmpParams_'+id] = {
				instanceID 		: 'solrator_' + id,
				tipoEmpilhamento: 	$(e).find("input[name='tipo']").val(),
				dominio 		: 	$(e).find("input[name='dominio']").val(), 
				canal 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='canal']").val(), 
				termos 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='termos']").val(),
				secoes 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='secoes']").val(), 
				secoesEH 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='secoesEH']").val(), 
				limit 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='limit']").val(),
     			limitOlho 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='limitOlho']").val(),
				hasPagination 	: 	$(e).find("input[name='hasPagination']").val(),
				tipoConteudo 	: 	$(e).find("input[name='tipoConteudo']").val(),
				objectsToPopulate : {
					container 	: $(e).find(".container"),
					pagination 	: $(e).find(".pagination")
				}
			};
			
			
			/*termos vindo da url*/
			if((window.location.pathname.match(/p\d+\.html/) == null) && window.location.href.match(/noticias\/.+?/)){
				termosSplit = window.location.href.replace(/\/$/,"").split('/');
				termosStr = decodeURI(termosSplit[termosSplit.length-1]);
				
				$(e).find('h3').eq(0).html('ÚLTIMAS NOTÍCIAS COM "'+termosStr+'"');
				
				window['tmpParams_'+id].termos = tiraAcento(termosStr);
			}else if(window.location.href.match(/noticias\/.+?/)){
				termosSplit = window.location.href.split('/');
				termosStr = decodeURI(termosSplit[termosSplit.length-2]);
				
				$(e).find('h3').eq(0).html('ÚLTIMAS NOTÍCIAS COM "'+termosStr+'"');
				
				window['tmpParams_'+id].termos = tiraAcento(termosStr);
			}else{
				
			}
			
			/*generalclass*/
			if(window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "video" 
				|| window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "paginaDeEmpilhamento"
				|| window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "ultimasNoticias"
			){
				$("#"+id).addClass("noticia-video");
			}else if(window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "galeria"){
				$("#"+id).addClass("galeria");
			}else{
				$("#"+id).addClass("custom");
			}
			
			var thefn = '';			
			/*ganchos de acao para filtragem de dados*/
			var hooks = ['beforeRender','beforeRenderItem','afterRender','afterRenderItem','callback'];
			for(var h in hooks){
			
				thefn = $(e).find("textarea[name='"+hooks[h]+"']").val()
					.replace(/ gt /g,' > ')
					.replace(/ gte /g,' >= ')
					.replace(/ lt /g,' < ')
					.replace(/ lte /g,' < ')
			
				if($(e).find("textarea[name='"+hooks[h]+"']").val().search('function') > -1){
					eval('(window["tmpParams_'+id+'"]["'+hooks[h]+'"] = ' + thefn + ')'); 
				}
			}
			
			/*cria instancia do solrator na pagina*/
			window['solrator_' + id] = new Solrator();
			window['solrator_' + id].init(window['tmpParams_'+id]);
			
			/*sobrepondo o template customizado da instancia*/
			window['solrator_' + id].options.templates.items.custom = $(e).find("textarea[name='template']").val();
			
			/*gera o empilhamento*/
			window['solrator_' + id].empilha();
			
			/*limpa params temporarios*/
			window['tmpParams_'+id] = null;					
		}
	}
}
</script>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <!-- FIM CONTEÚDO -->
        <!-- INICIO BARRA LATERAL -->

            <div class="HTE04906 gd6 fl" id="BDC990D6-F314-4239-842B-C8ABB4E44BEF">              <div>
                <div id="fb-root"></div>
                <script>(function(d, s, id) {

  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.8&appId=293731637308586";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>

        <!-- FIM RODAPÉ -->
        <script type="text/javascript">(function($){$.fn.lazyLoad = function() {var images = this;function showVisible(){   images = $.grep(images, function(el,index){var img = $(el);var imgTop = img.offset().top, wTop = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height() + 100;if(wTop > imgTop){    img.attr('src', img.data('src')).fadeIn();   return false;}else{   return true;}   });}showVisible();$(window).scroll(function(){showVisible();});}})( jQuery );var strUrl = ''+location+'',verificaEditor=/edicao\.html/,verificaEditorPreview=/edicaoHomes\/preview/,adShow = false;showIgAd = (strUrl.match(verificaEditor) && !strUrl.match(verificaEditorPreview)) ? false : true;editor = (verificaEditor.test(location.href) && !verificaEditorPreview.test(location.href)) ? true : false;/* Lazy Load */if(!editor){$('.lazy-load').lazyLoad();}$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/publicidade.js?v=2.1.0', function(){if(showIgAd){iGpub.init();iGpub.posiciona();};});$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/shopping/coluna/slayer.v3.min.js?v=0.3', function(){if($('#shoppingLayer')[0]){if($('meta[name=iG-OAS-site]').attr("content") == 'www.ultimosegundo.com.br'){$(shoppingLayer('http://i1.statig.com.br/igshopping/json/ig_internas_antigas_1.json','OLX','http://i1.statig.com.br/igshopping/json/branded_noticias_OLX_1.json'))}else{$(shoppingLayer($('meta[name=iG-shopping]').attr("content")))}}});$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/shopping/coluna/slayerNovoShopping.js', function(){if($('#shoppingLayerReco')[0]){ $(montaRecomendada($('#shoppingLayerReco').attr("data-json")))}});$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/iGSearchBox.js?v=1.1');$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/jquery.colorbox-min.js', function(){$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/jquery.validate.js');var head  = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],    link  = document.createElement('link');    link.rel  = 'stylesheet';    link.type = 'text/css';    link.href = 'http://i0.statig.com.br/css/noticias/colorbox.css';    link.media = 'all';    head.appendChild(link);$(".boxFaleconosco").colorbox();$(".boxIndiqueosite").colorbox();});                $("#island_300x250_PPA01306").css({                    position : 'fixed',                    top : spacingTop,                    left : '50%',                    marginLeft : '178px'                });     <script>/* fixa o menu */var pageUrl = window.location.href;function fixMenuOnScroll(){var menu = $('#menu-N');var geral = $('#geral');var offSetMenu = 118;    $(window).scroll(function(){      var offSetWindow = $(window).scrollTop();      if ( offSetWindow >= offSetMenu ) {        menu.addClass('menu-fixed');        geral.addClass('geral-absolute');      } else {        menu.removeClass('menu-fixed');        geral.removeClass('geral-absolute');      }    });}fixMenuOnScroll();/* fixa po menu */var calculatadeMenu = false;  function larguraSubmenus(){var aba,paddingR,totalAba,container,retorno;$('#menu-N li.sub').each(function(){aba = $(this).find('.aba').width();paddingR = $(this).find('.aba').css('padding-right').replace('px','');totalAba = aba + parseInt(paddingR);container = $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width();retorno = container - totalAba;        if($(this).hasClass('last')){if(($(this).position().left + $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width()) > 988){$(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').css('left',function(){return '-'+ retorno + 'px' });}}});    calculatadeMenu = true;  }  $('#buscar').focus(function(){$('#buscaGoogle').addClass('getFocus');});$('#buscar').blur(function(){$('#buscaGoogle').removeClass('getFocus');});$('#menu-N h2 a').hover(function(){if(!calculatadeMenu){larguraSubmenus();}$(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({visibility: "visible"}).animate({opacity: 1}, 50, function() {});},function(){openedMenu = setTimeout(function(obj){$('.menuContainer').animate({opacity: 0}, 50, function() {$(this).css({visibility: "hidden"})})},300);});$('#menu-N .menuContainer').hover(function(){$(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({visibility: "visible",opacity:1});clearInterval(openedMenu);}, function() {$(this).animate({opacity: 0}, 50, function() {$(this).css({visibility: "hidden"})})});</script>

src="http://js.statig.com.br/regionalizacao/minasgerais/RTI30018.min.js"></scr'+'ipt>',rti30018_brasilia: '<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http://js.statig.com.br/regionalizacao/brasilia/RTI30018.min.js?v=0.0.2"></scr'+'ipt>',noticia_real    : '<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascr'+'ipt" src="http://js.statig.com.br/ultimosegundo/rt/rodapenoticias.min.js?v=0.0.1.1"></scr'+'ipt>',solratorec_compo    : '<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascr'+'ipt" src="http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/solratorec-min.js?v=1.4"></scr'+'ipt>',};}/** * Agrupa chamadas aos scripts que devem carregar */ScriptsSiteiG.prototype.baixar = function(){var self = this;/* regra para baixar somente nas homes */if ( IG_INFO.SECAO === 'home' ) {/*carregamento do script do componente LIASOLREC*/document.write( self.scripts.solratorec_compo );/* ultimo segundo */if ( IG_INFO.HOST.indexOf( 'ultimosegundo' ) > -1 || IG_INFO.SITE_ID === '4e7b756c7a6504a01e0000af' ) {document.write( self.scripts.rti30018_useg );}/* minas gerais */if ( IG_INFO.HOST.indexOf( 'minasgerais' ) > -1 || IG_INFO.SITE_ID === '51683ec081c77ab423000452' ) {document.write( self.scripts.rti30018_minas );}/* minas gerais */if ( IG_INFO.HOST.indexOf( 'brasilia' ) > -1 || IG_INFO.SITE_ID === '52fa752a7e41f8676c0006fa' ) {document.write( self.scripts.rti30018_brasilia );}}else if( IG_INFO.SECAO !== undefined && IG_INFO.SECAO !== 'home'  ){/* regra para baixar somente nas sub-homes *//*carregamento do script do componente LIASOLREC*/document.write( self.scripts.solratorec_compo );}else if( IG_INFO.SECAO === undefined ){/* regra para baixar somente nas noticias *//*carreagamento do componente RTI30018 no rodape das noticiasw*/document.write( self.scripts.noticia_real );}};/** * Agrupa chamadas a scripts que devem carregar no modo EDICAO */ScriptsSiteiG.prototype.baixarModeEdicao = function(){var self = this;document.write( self.scripts.jquery_ui_edicao );};/** * Agrupar chamadas a scripts que devem carregar no modo PUBLICADO */ScriptsSiteiG.prototype.baixarModePublicado = function(){var self = this;document.write( self.scripts.jquery_ui_producao );self.baixar();};/** * Recupera informacoes relacionadas ao site e a secao das meta tags do header do template */var head = $('head');var IG_INFO = {URL : window.location.href,SITE_ID : head.find('meta[name="iG-site-id"]').attr('content'),SECAO : head.find('meta[name="iG-secao-nome-normalizado"]').attr('content'),HOST : window.location.host};/** * Identifica em qual modo a pagina se encontra */var PAGE_MODE = {EDICAO : null,PREVIEW : null,PUBLICADO : null};if ( IG_INFO.URL.indexOf( 'edicao.html' ) > -1 ) {PAGE_MODE.EDICAO = true;} else if ( IG_INFO.URL.indexOf( 'preview' ) > -1 ) {PAGE_MODE.PREVIEW = true;} else {PAGE_MODE.PUBLICADO = true;}/** * Esconde a publicidade quando false */var showIgAd = PAGE_MODE.PUBLICADO;/** * Instancia o objeto que deve baixar scripts */var scriptsSiteiG = new ScriptsSiteiG();/* roda scripts e faz alteracoes na pagina de acordo com o MODO de EDICAO (PREVIEW, EDICAO ou PUBLICACAO) */if ( PAGE_MODE.EDICAO ) {scriptsSiteiG.baixarModeEdicao();$('body').addClass( 'mode-edicao' );} else {if ( PAGE_MODE.PREVIEW ) {$('body').addClass( 'mode-preview' );}scriptsSiteiG.baixarModePublicado();}/* se for o saudebucal adiciona uma tag para rastrear o usuário */if(IG_INFO.URL.indexOf( 'saudebucal' ) > -1 && !PAGE_MODE.EDICAO){$('head').append('<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascript" src="//nexus.ensighten.com/colgatepalmolive/Bootstrap.js"></scr'+'ipt>');}/* Verifica se o canal é Esporte e cria a função que irá definir a publicidade da TV */function initTVPub(idPublicidade){$('#'+ idPublicidade).html('');$('#'+ idPublicidade).append('<div style="width:302px;height:252px;margin: 5px 9px;" id="TVEsporteHome"></div><small>publicidade</small>');}</script>

            <div class="LIASOLR gd6 fl gd12" id="2662D3F0-E8F2-4861-A231-BBFA9EC3D850">              <div class="theId" id="empminas">                <a class="anchor" name="solrator_empminas"></a>

                <textarea name="afterRender" style="display: none;"></textarea>

                <h3>Últimas Notícias</h3>
                <ul class="container"></ul>
                <div class="clear"></div>

                <div class="clear"></div>
                <a class="linkGeral " style="display: none;"></a>

              <script type="text/javascript">

function tiraAcento(text) {

var acentos =[
	/[\300-\306]/g, /[\340-\346]/g, // A, a
	/[\310-\313]/g, /[\350-\353]/g, // E, e
	/[\314-\317]/g, /[\354-\357]/g, // I, i
	/[\322-\330]/g, /[\362-\370]/g, // O, o
	/[\331-\334]/g, /[\371-\374]/g, // U, u
	/[\321]/g, /[\361]/g, // N, n
	/[\307]/g, /[\347]/g, // C, c
	];

var chars = ['A','a','E','e','I','i','O','o','U','u','N','n','C','c'];

for (var i = 0; i < acentos.length; i++) {
    text = text.replace(acentos[i],chars[i]);
}

return text;
}

if(typeof Solrator != 'undefined'){

	/*todos os empilhamentos solr*/
	var els = $(".LIASOLR");
		
	for(x=0;x<els.length;x++){
		
		/*el*/
		e = els[x];
		
		if(!$(e).hasClass("alreadyLoaded")){
			
			/*para evitar duplo carregamento para multiplos componentes solr na pagina
			* add class alreadyLoaded
			*/
			$(e).addClass("alreadyLoaded");
			
			/*id da instancia global na pagina*/
			var id = $(e).find("input[name='id']").val();
						
			
			/*params*/			
			window['tmpParams_'+id] = {
				instanceID 		: 'solrator_' + id,
				tipoEmpilhamento: 	$(e).find("input[name='tipo']").val(),
				dominio 		: 	$(e).find("input[name='dominio']").val(), 
				canal 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='canal']").val(), 
				termos 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='termos']").val(),
				secoes 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='secoes']").val(), 
				secoesEH 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='secoesEH']").val(), 
				limit 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='limit']").val(),
     			limitOlho 			: 	$(e).find("input[name='limitOlho']").val(),
				hasPagination 	: 	$(e).find("input[name='hasPagination']").val(),
				tipoConteudo 	: 	$(e).find("input[name='tipoConteudo']").val(),
				objectsToPopulate : {
					container 	: $(e).find(".container"),
					pagination 	: $(e).find(".pagination")
				}
			};
			
			
			/*termos vindo da url*/
			if((window.location.pathname.match(/p\d+\.html/) == null) && window.location.href.match(/noticias\/.+?/)){
				termosSplit = window.location.href.replace(/\/$/,"").split('/');
				termosStr = decodeURI(termosSplit[termosSplit.length-1]);
				
				$(e).find('h3').eq(0).html('ÚLTIMAS NOTÍCIAS COM "'+termosStr+'"');
				
				window['tmpParams_'+id].termos = tiraAcento(termosStr);
			}else if(window.location.href.match(/noticias\/.+?/)){
				termosSplit = window.location.href.split('/');
				termosStr = decodeURI(termosSplit[termosSplit.length-2]);
				
				$(e).find('h3').eq(0).html('ÚLTIMAS NOTÍCIAS COM "'+termosStr+'"');
				
				window['tmpParams_'+id].termos = tiraAcento(termosStr);
			}else{
				
			}
			
			/*generalclass*/
			if(window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "video" 
				|| window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "paginaDeEmpilhamento"
				|| window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "ultimasNoticias"
			){
				$("#"+id).addClass("noticia-video");
			}else if(window['tmpParams_'+id].tipoEmpilhamento == "galeria"){
				$("#"+id).addClass("galeria");
			}else{
				$("#"+id).addClass("custom");
			}
			
			var thefn = '';			
			/*ganchos de acao para filtragem de dados*/
			var hooks = ['beforeRender','beforeRenderItem','afterRender','afterRenderItem','callback'];
			for(var h in hooks){
			
				thefn = $(e).find("textarea[name='"+hooks[h]+"']").val()
					.replace(/ gt /g,' > ')
					.replace(/ gte /g,' >= ')
					.replace(/ lt /g,' < ')
					.replace(/ lte /g,' < ')
			
				if($(e).find("textarea[name='"+hooks[h]+"']").val().search('function') > -1){
					eval('(window["tmpParams_'+id+'"]["'+hooks[h]+'"] = ' + thefn + ')'); 
				}
			}
			
			/*cria instancia do solrator na pagina*/
			window['solrator_' + id] = new Solrator();
			window['solrator_' + id].init(window['tmpParams_'+id]);
			
			/*sobrepondo o template customizado da instancia*/
			window['solrator_' + id].options.templates.items.custom = $(e).find("textarea[name='template']").val();
			
			/*gera o empilhamento*/
			window['solrator_' + id].empilha();
			
			/*limpa params temporarios*/
			window['tmpParams_'+id] = null;					
		}
	}
}
</script>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <!-- FIM CONTEÚDO -->
        <!-- INICIO BARRA LATERAL -->

            <div class="HTE04906 gd6 fl" id="BDC990D6-F314-4239-842B-C8ABB4E44BEF">              <div>
                <div id="fb-root"></div>

  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.8&appId=293731637308586";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>

        <!-- FIM RODAPÉ -->
        <script type="text/javascript">(function($){$.fn.lazyLoad = function() {var images = this;function showVisible(){   images = $.grep(images, function(el,index){var img = $(el);var imgTop = img.offset().top, wTop = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height() + 100;if(wTop > imgTop){    img.attr('src', img.data('src')).fadeIn();   return false;}else{   return true;}   });}showVisible();$(window).scroll(function(){showVisible();});}})( jQuery );var strUrl = ''+location+'',verificaEditor=/edicao\.html/,verificaEditorPreview=/edicaoHomes\/preview/,adShow = false;showIgAd = (strUrl.match(verificaEditor) && !strUrl.match(verificaEditorPreview)) ? false : true;editor = (verificaEditor.test(location.href) && !verificaEditorPreview.test(location.href)) ? true : false;/* Lazy Load */if(!editor){$('.lazy-load').lazyLoad();}$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/publicidade.js?v=2.1.0', function(){if(showIgAd){iGpub.init();iGpub.posiciona();};});$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/shopping/coluna/slayer.v3.min.js?v=0.3', function(){if($('#shoppingLayer')[0]){if($('meta[name=iG-OAS-site]').attr("content") == 'www.ultimosegundo.com.br'){$(shoppingLayer('http://i1.statig.com.br/igshopping/json/ig_internas_antigas_1.json','OLX','http://i1.statig.com.br/igshopping/json/branded_noticias_OLX_1.json'))}else{$(shoppingLayer($('meta[name=iG-shopping]').attr("content")))}}});$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/shopping/coluna/slayerNovoShopping.js', function(){if($('#shoppingLayerReco')[0]){ $(montaRecomendada($('#shoppingLayerReco').attr("data-json")))}});$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/iGSearchBox.js?v=1.1');$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/jquery.colorbox-min.js', function(){$.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/jquery.validate.js');var head  = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],    link  = document.createElement('link');    link.rel  = 'stylesheet';    link.type = 'text/css';    link.href = 'http://i0.statig.com.br/css/noticias/colorbox.css';    link.media = 'all';    head.appendChild(link);$(".boxFaleconosco").colorbox();$(".boxIndiqueosite").colorbox();}); $(window).load(function(){(iGpub) && iGpub.posiciona();})</script><script type="text/javascript">/*criei esta validação por causa do canal do esporte,o canal esta utilizando dois templates.var urlExcecao*/var url = window.location.href.split("/")[3];var urlExcecao = window.location.href.split("/")[5];if(url != "futebol" || urlExcecao == "atletico-mg-campeao-2014"){function ScrollBarraLateral(){/*Scroll do componente*/sidebar = (function(){var regexChannels = /festajunina|viglr|natal|retrospectiva|pascoa/,urlTotest= window.location.href,exceptionChannel = false;        function Sidebar(){            this.el = $('#barra-lateral');            var windowWidth = window.innerWidth ? window.innerWidth : $(window).width();        }        Sidebar.prototype.reposition = function (scrollTop) {                    var distanciaTop = 545,                p = $("#conteudo"),                spacingTop = -155;                           var offset = p.offset();                distanciaTop = offset.top - spacingTop;                this.SCROLL_START_REPOSITION = distanciaTop;exceptionChannel = regexChannels.test(urlTotest);            if (scrollTop > this.SCROLL_START_REPOSITION){                if( exceptionChannel ){                $(this.el).css({                    position : 'fixed',                    top : '125px',                    left : '50%',                    marginLeft : '178px'                });                $("#island_300x250_PPA01306").css({                    position : 'fixed',                    top : '125px',                    left : '50%',                    marginLeft : '178px'                });                }else{                $(this.el).css({                    position : 'fixed',                    top : spacingTop,                    left : '50%',                    marginLeft : '178px'                });                $("#island_300x250_PPA01306").css({                    position : 'fixed',                    top : spacingTop,                    left : '50%',                    marginLeft : '178px'                });     <script>/* fixa o menu */var pageUrl = window.location.href;function fixMenuOnScroll(){var menu = $('#menu-N');var geral = $('#geral');var offSetMenu = 118;    $(window).scroll(function(){      var offSetWindow = $(window).scrollTop();      if ( offSetWindow >= offSetMenu ) {        menu.addClass('menu-fixed');        geral.addClass('geral-absolute');      } else {        menu.removeClass('menu-fixed');        geral.removeClass('geral-absolute');      }    });}fixMenuOnScroll();/* fixa po menu */var calculatadeMenu = false;  function larguraSubmenus(){var aba,paddingR,totalAba,container,retorno;$('#menu-N li.sub').each(function(){aba = $(this).find('.aba').width();paddingR = $(this).find('.aba').css('padding-right').replace('px','');totalAba = aba + parseInt(paddingR);container = $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width();retorno = container - totalAba;        if($(this).hasClass('last')){if(($(this).position().left + $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width()) > 988){$(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').css('left',function(){return '-'+ retorno + 'px' });}}});    calculatadeMenu = true;  }  $('#buscar').focus(function(){$('#buscaGoogle').addClass('getFocus');});$('#buscar').blur(function(){$('#buscaGoogle').removeClass('getFocus');});$('#menu-N h2 a').hover(function(){if(!calculatadeMenu){larguraSubmenus();}$(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({visibility: "visible"}).animate({opacity: 1}, 50, function() {});},function(){openedMenu = setTimeout(function(obj){$('.menuContainer').animate({opacity: 0}, 50, function() {$(this).css({visibility: "hidden"})})},300);});$('#menu-N .menuContainer').hover(function(){$(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({visibility: "visible",opacity:1});clearInterval(openedMenu);}, function() {$(this).animate({opacity: 0}, 50, function() {$(this).css({visibility: "hidden"})})});</script>
